dsml_meetup_2025.title: DSML MEETUP 2025
dsml_meetup_2025.subtitle: The largest AI/ML event in Kazakhstan
dsml_meetup_2025.description_1: Join us for the biggest Data Science and Machine Learning meetup in Kazakhstan! This year we're bringing together the brightest minds in AI/ML to share knowledge, network, and inspire the next generation of data scientists.
dsml_meetup_2025.description_2: The event will feature presentations from leading experts, hands-on workshops, networking sessions, and much more. Don't miss this opportunity to be part of Kazakhstan's growing AI/ML community!
dsml_meetup_2025.speakers_note: Click on speaker photos to view their profiles
